subject: RE: [junit] Testing Servlets
msgSnippet: ... I can t speak for j2eeunit, but httpunit does handle post requests.  It has a class, PostMethodWebRequest which is a subclass of WebRequest. ... Have a
messageBody:
RE: [junit] Testing Servlets

> 1) Do they handle post requests?

I can't speak for j2eeunit, but httpunit does handle post requests.  It has a class, PostMethodWebRequest which is a subclass of WebRequest.

> 2) Are there any alternatives or better frameworks to test Servlets?

Have a look at http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?ServletTesting and http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?ServletUnitTest which might help you out.

Gabriel
